alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Leon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Freestone, northeastern Leon and southeastern Anderson Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1043 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Fairfield Lake State Park to 6 miles north of Centerville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palestine, Buffalo, Elkhart, Corinth, Jewett, Oakwood, Tucker, Lanely, Salmon, Cedar Creek, Flo, Slocum, Broom City, Redtown, Denson Spring, Crystal Lake, Red Lake, Johnson and Mound City. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 170 and 182. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Texas.
